did was 1.2 billion, but that was for a personal level to save me time 
raising money to make mega characters.  I might have to take time to 
reach the maximum level number for gold.  I accidentl crossed over it 
and my gold was seriously weaker.  That scenario will NEVER be 
released with the rest of my scenarios.

  All else has at least standard 1 million in gold/silver [except for 
one that has no gold in it].  Trust me, by the time you get to the 
last scenario, you might [emphasis: might] be able to pull off defeat 
against a certain scenario I created first.  That is the goal I am 
working towards with my scenarios.

My idea was you tackle a few (4-5) enemies at a time.  I might try to 
consider the number of teams down to 2 and see if that helps the 
situation.  The worst offenders of breaking down doors happen to be 
DRUIDS.  Go figure.

  My own team is really stupid about NOT destroying enemy trees.  They 
would go around it or turn around before destroying the damn trees.  I 
have to personally remove enemy trees.  The only way they will 
demolish trees is if there is a powerfull enemy protected by trees 
(that was an experiment to see what it would take for my own team 
mates to demolish trees).
